text: using AWS I don't need to worry about my
servers anymore I don't need to worry
about my processes crashing My business
processes they just work My name is
Marco Merren I am chief of the
integrated aviation analysis section in
the international civil aviation
organization in in Montreal the uh
international civil aviation
organization or ko it's an international
organization of the UN and we have
basically responsible for writing
standards and recommended practices for
the whole aviation community Uh KO has
started looking into cloud solutions a
few years ago when uh when we were
getting more engaged in predictive
analysis or trying to find where will be
the the future needs u aviation globally
and try to see where would it be best
for us to invest uh our resources We
have users of that kind of information
all around the world using any kind of
device and uh it became more important
that the data which is um and
information provided to them is reliable
can get there fast and is available at
at any time The EC2 solution from from
AWS must say came in very handy because
we were able to to create to launch test
servers and production servers for any
kind of usage create them for a period
of a few months to do a workshop and
then delete them again We were able to
experiment a certain number of of
techniques which we would never been
able to to experiment on in-house uh
in-house infrastructure The first things
we we actually migrated was our analysis
processes We tried to do only web- based
applications So the first thing we did
was we put a few of those algorithms
back onto the the server sites From then
on we actually created new things
directly on the cloud So we we stopped
developing uh inhouse We actually
develop directly directly in the cloud
and also deploying code directly in the
cloud We use uh S3 of course which is
really the the ideal place uh for us to
um to store data either permanently or
or temporarily The general public can
actually buy um location indicators
which are codes of airports That's a
data set we are selling So if someone
buys that data set we are actually uh
providing a link to an a bucket and an
data on S3 So we actually delivering our
sales through this uh through S3 from my
point of view is that uh I don't need to
worry about my servers my processes and
everything just works
